name: Water Snake! Game and Construct 3 Tutorial
name_original: Water Snake! Game and Construct 3 Tutorial
description:
Hello Everyone!

My take on a classic. Give it a play and let me know what your high score ends up being :) I have published a tutorial on how this was made in Construct 3 linked below using free assets, car behavior, mesh distortion, and some physics for fun in less than 50 events.

I go through things fairly quickly so please feel free to download the project file below and go through everything at your own pace and improve on it

---

GAME CONTROLS:

A to turn Left

D to turn Right

---

Feel free to use however, no credit needed, cc0 etc. 

Check it out on YouTube and let me know what you think!  Subscribe if you enjoyed, would make my day :)
